p: In Maranhão, DENV-2 was reported for the first time in 2001, in the capital of São Luís, and the first cases of hemorrhagic fever and deaths occurred in the following year [ 98]. Studies have associated the occurrence of more severe forms of the disease to infections by DENV-2 [ 99, 100]. Moreover, the higher genetic variability of this serotype may contribute to the disease severity [ 101].
